name: Type Like A Hacker
description:
Ever wanted to feel like a hacker? Just open this program and type anything! You'll feel like you actually know how to program stuff. 

It's free! All you have to do is type!

The program chooses random bits of (fake) code to display and will run as long as you type. Just close it when you're done.

Note: The program has bugged out a couple times during playtesting. If this happens, just close it and open it up again.

Please leave a comment telling me what you think and if you want me to add any other features.
